resources.string: Get the fresh data and check status of your assets or find more about this app.

This app is developed under GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 3.


*Notice: This app is still under development. This README -file gets updated once in a while as development gets further.


An Android app that makes it easy to gather data from various assets to one place. With powerful use of web API, user can get fresh data of assets of they like from the Internet. Fresh data makes it easy to follow and analyze different crypto- and blockchain-asset values and holdings. With this app user can get complete and up to date information of his/her holdings.


Main features:
 *Powerful web API to get fresh data from the Internet
 *Add and remove assets
 *Change asset data
 *Store app data in secure Internal storage, where only this app have access
 *App is using ListView-ArrayAdapter solution to be as memory efficient as possible


Developed by Taika Ent.
